verses.verse: <S%H2451>Doesn't<s%> wisdom <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5414>out?<s%> <S%H2451>Doesn't<s%> understanding raise her <S%H6963>voice?<s%>
On the <S%H7218>top<s%> of high <S%H4791>places<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> where the <S%H5410>paths<s%> <S%H1004>meet,<s%> she <S%H5324>stands.<s%>
Beside the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H3027>at<s%> the <S%H6310>entry<s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%> at the <S%H6310>entry<s%> <S%H6607>doors,<s%> she cries <S%H7442>aloud:<s%>
"To you <S%H376>men,<s%> I <S%H7121>call!<s%> I send my <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>mankind.<s%>
You <S%H6612>simple,<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6195>prudence.<s%> You <S%H3684>fools,<s%> be of an <S%H6195>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> for I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> excellent <S%H5057>things.<s%> The <S%H4669>opening<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> is for right <S%H4339>things.<s%>
For my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> <S%H1897>speaks<s%> <S%H571>truth.<s%> <S%H7562>Wickedness<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
All the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> There is nothing <S%H6617>crooked<s%> or perverse in <S%H6617>them.<s%>
They are all <S%H5228>plain<s%> to him who <S%H995>understands,<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> to those who <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
<S%H3947>Receive<s%> my <S%H4148>instruction<s%> rather than <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> rather than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies.<s%> All the things that may be <S%H2656>desired<s%> <S%H7737>can't<s%> be compared to it.
<S%H2451>"I,<s%> wisdom, have made <S%H6195>prudence<s%> my <S%H7931>dwelling.<s%> Find <S%H4672>out<s%> knowledge and <S%H1847>discretion.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is to <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1344>pride,<s%> <S%H1344>arrogance,<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H6098>Counsel<s%> and sound <S%H8454>knowledge<s%> are <S%H8454>mine.<s%> I have understanding and <S%H1369>power.<s%>
By me <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and <S%H7336>princes<s%> <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H6664>justice.<s%>
By me <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8323>rule;<s%> <S%H5081>nobles,<s%> and all the righteous <S%H8199>rulers<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
I <S%H157>love<s%> those who <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7836>me.<s%> Those who seek me diligently will find <S%H4672>me.<s%>
With me are <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H3519>honor,<s%> <S%H6276>enduring<s%> <S%H1952>wealth,<s%> and <S%H6666>prosperity.<s%>
My <S%H6529>fruit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2742>gold,<s%> <S%H6337>yes,<s%> than fine gold; my <S%H8393>yield<s%> than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5410>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>justice;<s%>
That I may <S%H5157>give<s%> <S%H3426>wealth<s%> to those who <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4390>me.<s%> I fill their <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>
<S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H7069>possessed<s%> me in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H4659>work,<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> his deeds of <S%H4659>old.<s%>
I was set <S%H5258>up<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning,<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> the earth <S%H776>existed.<s%>
When there were no <S%H8415>depths,<s%> I was brought <S%H2342>forth,<s%> when there were no <S%H4599>springs<s%> <S%H3513>abounding<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>
Before the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2883>settled<s%> in <S%H6440>place,<s%> before the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> I was brought <S%H2342>forth;<s%>
while as yet he had not <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> nor the <S%H2351>fields,<s%> nor the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H8398>world.<s%>
When he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> I was <S%H2710>there;<s%> when he set a <S%H2329>circle<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep,<s%>
when he <S%H553>established<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> when the <S%H5869>springs<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> became <S%H5810>strong,<s%>

when he <S%H7760>gave<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> its <S%H2706>boundary,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> should not <S%H5674>violate<s%> his <S%H6310>commandment,<s%> when he <S%H2710>marked<s%> out the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
then I was the <S%H525>craftsman<s%> by <S%H681>his<s%> <S%H8191>side.<s%> I was a delight <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H6256>day,<s%> always <S%H7832>rejoicing<s%> before <S%H6440>him,<s%>
<S%H7832>Rejoicing<s%> in his <S%H8398>whole<s%> <S%H776>world.<s%> My <S%H8191>delight<s%> was with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
"Now <S%H1121>therefore,<s%> my sons, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H835>me,<s%> for blessed are those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise.<s%> <S%H6544>Don't<s%> refuse it.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H8245>me,<s%> watching <S%H3117>daily<s%> at my <S%H1817>gates,<s%> <S%H8104>waiting<s%> at my <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H4201>posts.<s%>
For whoever <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H4672>me,<s%> finds <S%H2416>life,<s%> and will <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
But he who <S%H2398>sins<s%> against me <S%H2554>wrongs<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%> All those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>"
